songs.title: Choosin
songs.lyrics:
Yeah yeah

Yeah yeah

Choosin

Choosin

Choosin

Choose up one time

Don't be shy
Does she coming or missing
Don't doubt it

Be wise by who you calling your own
'Cause you might be left alone, that's right
This star's so bright, she can not put too far though
She get it back tomorrow

Now she's
